mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "userId", a.title AS "title", a.status AS "status", a.product_type_id AS "productTypeId", a.shop_level AS "shopLevel", a.sales_before AS "salesBefore", a.star_plate AS "starPlate", a.fans_nums AS "fansNums", a.if_send AS "ifSend", a.profit_ratio AS "profitRatio", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.enable_flag AS "enableFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id as 'id', a.title as 'title', d2.dict_value as 'productType', a.fans_nums as 'fansNums', d.dict_value as 'starPlate', a.profit_ratio as 'profitRatio', a.shop_level as 'shopLevel', a.if_send as 'ifSend', a.sales_before as 'salesBefore', a.create_date as 'createDate', r.starTag as 'starTag' from ho_pure_offer a left join ho_dict d2 on a.product_type_id=d2.id left join ho_dict d on d.id=a.star_plate left join ( SELECT a.pure_offer_id,GROUP_CONCAT( d.dict_value ) AS 'starTag' FROM ho_pure_offer_tag a LEFT JOIN ho_dict d ON d.id = a.dict_id GROUP BY a.pure_offer_id)r on r.pure_offer_id = a.id where 1=1 and a.enable_flag='1' and status='AP'
and b.type=#{productType}
and a.create_date > date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')
and a.create_date > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL '7' DAY),'%Y%m%d')
and a.create_date > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(now(),INTERVAL '30' DAY),'%Y%m%d')
and a.user_id=#{userId}
order by a.create_date desc

and a.user_id=#{userId}
and a.title like concat('%',#{keys},'%')
order by a.create_date desc
